ygData.subject: Re: Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
ygData.msgSnippet: To prevent this, attack an enermy by clicking on melee instead of hitting A.
ygData.messageBody:
To prevent this, attack an enermy by clicking on "melee" instead of
hitting A.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> last info i heard is that we can equip this dagger into the throwing
> slot... so when i auto attack will the char be stupid enough to
> throw? also... is shuriken useful? any suggestions as if i should pick
> up throwing? will be a useful tool if a wizard attempts to root me...
> n i can throw fast enough to disrupt him/her.. saw this in some
> disussion board... any
> comments? Nic--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
